name: Big City Stories
description:
Hello Mayor! Congratulations, you're in charge of a small city with high hopes and endless potential. Use your imagination to build your dream city, full of action and adventure. Turn your streets into a stunt course complete with ramps and flaming hoops, soar to the top of skyscrapers with air jets, run over invading zombies, host parties for your friends, and so much more!

As mayor you have the power to whatever you like with your city, and with great power comes great rewards. Earn dozens of in-game prizes, such as cool clothing, fast cars, and even superpowers! Use your rewards to improve your city and impress your friends.

Additional hardware required for Remote Play.
